name: University of Mississippi - German Studies Department
description: While not a direct admissions guidance service, this department offers a Bachelor of Arts in German and can provide information about studying German language and culture. They also have information on study abroad opportunities in Germany

description: This institute assists international students with admissions and provides support services. They can offer guidance on the application process for international students

description: This office provides advising and support for international students at USM, including guidance on admissions and navigating the university system

name: Mississippi College - International Institute
description: Mississippi College's International Institute assists international students with admissions and provides resources for those looking to study at the university

name: Quad Education

name: EduGermany
